welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lower Macungie, where small town charm meets modern amenities. Take in the beautiful scenery, sample our famous local cuisine, and immerse yourself in our vibrant community. Enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
